zone.line: Typhon
or Saturn mightier later
Hades, Osiris or what later Gods
From all-prolific evil, since thy ruin
Have sprung, & trampled on my prostrate sons--
Ask & they must reply -- so the revenge
Of the supreme shall may sweep through vacant
shades
As rainy wind through the abandoned gate
Of a fallen palace
Prometheus
Mother, let not aught
Of that which may be evil, pass again
My lips, or those of aught resembling me--
Phantasm of Jupiter arise appear!
The sound beneath as of earthquake & the
driving of whirlwinds-- The Ravine is split, &
the Phantasm of Jupiter appears rises, surrounded
by heavy clouds which dart forth lightning
Panthea Ione
My wings are folded oer mine ears,
My wings are crossed over mine eyes,
Yet thro their silver shade appears
